storyInfo: Sanktas living outside Laterano come down with symptoms similar to 'falling' almost simultaneously. The Shrine of Nurtury towers above Laterano, almost touching the clouds. No one remembers when it appeared, but no one questions its existence.

attributes.text: I pray that the sick people in Faber Central Hospital get better!
I pray that Papà, Mamma, and my sister will always be safe, healthy, and happy!
I pray that the Lord will always be with us!
I pray that the spiritual light will always shine on Laterano!

attributes.content: 'I thought the experiment was over, Lemuel.'
'Didn't you hear? The investigators came to school today to tell us our results. They even brought fruit tarts!'
'The two patient groups at Faber Central Hospital were discharged today... basically, their recovery had nothing to do with our praying the past two months.'
'The investigators told us not to be sad. It was all a social experiment by the Sixth Tribunal.'
Another report from Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Over the past six months, they have established trade with seventeen nomadic cities, like a direswine that never rests.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: In the process, they have sown new seeds across all Siracusa.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: It sounds like you approve of Nuova Volsinii's interactions with other cities, but do not intend to endorse their promotion of the New Urban Management Act.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: You were the one who told me the youth need to be tested further, after you returned from Carnevale.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: I suppose I recall something to that effect.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: News from Terni. Unusual movement in Lupukarn.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: The Golden Empress has been actively issuing edicts, while her counterpart has not been seen in public for a long time... our neighbor seems eager to change. Desperate, even.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Not just Leithanien. There are more than enough new sprouts upon this land. The matters of the famiglie should not occupy any more of Siracusa's time.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Mm-hm.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: You seem ready to fall asleep.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: It's almost time for my siesta.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Do you like this fabric?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: I can have a suit made for you. I have just the tailor in mind.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Hah. I appreciate the offer, but there's no need.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Still prefer your cassock?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: I am a priest, Sicilia.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: But there is no church in this city. It's been almost seventy years since you left Laterano, hasn't it?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Sixty-eight. The Sankta sense of self is as persistent as our sweet tooth.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: But you've never thought about going back. You have no need to. The walls are still white, the people still happy. Nothing ever changes in Paradise.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Otherwise, you wouldn't have come with me to Siracusa.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: I'm not so sure...
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: My hand's been trembling every time I grip my patron firearm. Maybe my old house in the Holy City has sprung a leak.
attributes.name: Agenir
Agenir
attributes.content: We're relics of a bygone age, Sicilia. You know how old people have hunches about certain things.

attributes.name: Agenir
attributes.content: *Yawn*—
attributes.joined: We're relics of a bygone age, Sicilia. You know how old people have hunches about certain things.*Yawn*—

attributes.content: You should take a nap on the sofa.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Maybe we can find another setting to talk, once the down payment for this fabric has been made.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Sorry, sorry.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Zzz...
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Father? You didn't just fall asleep on your feet, did you? Father! Are you alright?!
attributes.name: Panicked Apprentice

attributes.content: Urryyyyy—
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: What? Is that all?
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Tila. Is the boss alright?
attributes.name: Blacksteel Administrator

attributes.content: Why do you ask?
attributes.name: Tila

attributes.content: These are all documents that he reviewed. The only thing Legal changed was the formatting. He shouldn't need to spend so much time with them, should he?
attributes.name: Blacksteel Administrator

attributes.content: I think Mr. Cliff is looking at that letter.
attributes.name: Tila

attributes.content: The letter from the frontier? What was the name on it again? Woodrow?
attributes.name: Blacksteel Administrator

attributes.content: But there were only four words in it. 'Am well. Take care.' That's it.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Administrator

attributes.content: I've heard a couple things about Davistown...
attributes.name: Blacksteel Administrator

attributes.content: What are you getting at?
attributes.name: Tila

attributes.content: This ship will be approaching Max D.C. in twelve hours' time. How long have we been planning our entry into the capital market?
attributes.name: Blacksteel Administrator

attributes.content: There're still a lot of problems to solve. Look at the people behind me. All our top ranks are waiting for the boss's orders!
attributes.name: Blacksteel Administrator

attributes.content: But at a time like this, he's all tied up with his... his—I don't even know what to call him!
attributes.name: Blacksteel Administrator

attributes.content: Mr. Cliff went to meet a certain Mr. Jackson before we set out.
attributes.name: Tila

attributes.content: Th-The Vice President?
attributes.name: Blacksteel Administrator

attributes.content: Do you mean to say the boss has gotten the official nod to our cooperation with the companies in DC—
attributes.name: Blacksteel Administrator

attributes.content: Don't get too excited.
attributes.name: Tila

attributes.content: No employee of Blacksteel Worldwide should doubt 'Clip' Cliff. Anything you don't think of, he will; anything you can't figure out, he will.
attributes.name: Tila

attributes.content: He was the one who put this team together, and he was the one who spread firearms beyond the walls of Laterano.
attributes.name: Tila

attributes.content: He was the one who expanded our business across the frontier, and beyond Columbia.
attributes.name: Tila

attributes.content: Mr. Cliff is a great leader, and a remarkable Sankta.
attributes.name: Tila

attributes.content: I agree completely, but... have you seen the look on his face? What could those four words have done to him?
attributes.name: Blacksteel Administrator

attributes.content: Ladies and gentlemen—
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: What? Did the power go out?
attributes.name: Blacksteel Administrator

attributes.content: Did some stupid merc knock something over? Or did Engineering cross the wrong wires?
attributes.name: Tila

attributes.content: Good news!
attributes.name: Jessica
Jessica
attributes.content: The wildfire's finally extinguished.

attributes.name: Jessica
attributes.content: The bad news is that half the hillside has been burned away—

attributes.name: Jessica
attributes.content: Woody? Are you okay? Are you hurt?
attributes.joined: The wildfire's finally extinguished.The bad news is that half the hillside has been burned away—Woody? Are you okay? Are you hurt?

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* I'm fine... it's nothing.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: He just came back from the woods to the west, where the worst of the fires were. He braved the flames to clear a control line.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: He might have forgotten his age...
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Can't let the fire take it all, not when things are finally looking up in these parts—I'm fine, I really am...
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: That's good to hear. I was worried.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Say, Woody, do you want to look at this?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: That's thick. Some kind of important document?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: It's from Blacksteel.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: You're not gonna open it, Woody?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: No, I don't think I want to.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: What if it's a whole stack of gold certificates? Would go a long way to filling the gap the fires left behind.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Well then, YOU open it.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Gladly.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Well, Mr. Cliff sure can write a letter. It's so long the end is touching the ground.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: What's the matter, Woody?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: I... suddenly have a headache.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Is it the letter, or your wounds?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Were you waiting long?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Mister Ezell!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Happy Birthday, Cecelia!
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: This cake...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I, er, made it out of sweet potato.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I couldn't find cream or confetti sugar, so I sprinkled some dried vegetables on top of it. I tried to find the ones that had better colors...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Sorry, I did my best... 'slaves' don't have access to the nicest things. Galena helped out.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: It's lovely!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Make a wish, Cecelia... well, I can guess what you'll wish for. Don't worry, I've been asking around. We'll find your father.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Yeah!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: But my wish today is—I want to blow out the candles with you.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: You've been helping me ever since I lost my mama, even quitting your job at the Notarial Hall and coming with me all the way to Kazdel.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: You've been by my side for so long.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I know you're in a lot of danger here, where my papa was born. It was you who taught me not to give up hope.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: That's why I want you to do this with me, the last thing at my birthday party.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Cecelia...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Ezell feels the warmth of Cecelia's hand in his own.

He sees the birthday cake made from sweet potatoes, and the girl with eyes full of excitement, and the big smile on her face. Before the flickering candlelight, both of them bow their heads and begin to pray.
May the order of Laterano shine upon us♪
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Show us the path of life♪
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: That we may ever live in joy♪
attributes.name: Cecelia & Ezell

attributes.content: East of the east of La Unidad♪
Laterano, holy city of white♪
Is that you, Aurela?
attributes.name: Alert Nun

attributes.content: Such noise.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: We're due for hymns in ten minutes. The children are practicing.
attributes.name: Alert Nun

attributes.content: I'm talking about you, Nueda.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: ...Is it done?
attributes.name: Nueda

attributes.content: Buried in the backyard. You can breathe easy now.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: Shouldn't you wash the blood first? The children could come at any time.
attributes.name: Nueda

attributes.content: What, are you afraid they might see me? Afraid they might hear their beloved Sister Nueda talk of killing people with that terrifying piece of metal?
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: Don't talk like that. We wouldn't be here if not for you... because you took up the gun, I am able to teach them hymns, and tuck them into bed.
attributes.name: Nueda

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: Was it Singas soldiers, or True Bolívarians guerrillas this time?
attributes.name: Nueda

attributes.content: Does it make a difference? A bunch of stinking parásitos who only know how to take from others.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: Never imagined there were shitholes like this when I lived in Laterano.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: I know... these sorts of things don't happen where you come from... in Laterano.
attributes.name: Nueda

attributes.content: Your weapon, your dress, your habits... you still carry yourself as a Lateran.
attributes.name: Nueda

attributes.content: A Lateran? Pah.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: Honestly, I still don't know why you follow the Lateran faith.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: I grew up in Bolívar, with no one to rely on. All I've ever known are these parásitos.
attributes.name: Nueda

attributes.content: I wanted to believe there was more to the land than ruined houses and barren fields, more than just war, death, and taxes. I wanted to believe there was a place full of food, flowers, and hope...
attributes.name: Nueda

attributes.content: And you wanted those chicos to believe it too.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: One person's faith is no faith at all. We all need to look out for each other, like you and I do...
attributes.name: Nueda

attributes.content: I wouldn't say we're looking out for one another.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: Shh... Aurela, you have protected this place as the holy light protects Laterano. You've let me imagine a Paradise bathed in holy light... even if I've never been there.
attributes.name: Nueda

attributes.content: Which is for the better.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: If you really do believe in a Paradise bathed in holy light, it's definitely not Laterano you're looking for. Look elsewhere.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: We're about to abandon this abbey, after all.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: Time to go in, Sister.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: The children are waiting for you to lead the last verse.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: Aurela...
attributes.name: Nueda

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: Why did you leave Laterano?
attributes.name: Nueda

attributes.content: Because I sinned, that's why... idiota.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: Nueda pushes the chapel door open.
East of the east of La Unidad♪
Laterano, holy city of white♪
There, the earth hides no bombs♪
There, the fields share wheat most bright♪
Abode of our Lord, font of parental love♪
He hears our prayers, He grants our wishes♪
All shall bask in His love♪
Even the legless, even the armless♪
...This might be our last Vespers.
attributes.name: Nueda

attributes.content: For years, we've tried to keep a low profile in this lawless land, to avoid the attention of the Singas nobles and the thugs who call themselves guerrillas.
attributes.name: Nueda

attributes.content: But they followed the trail of some escaped convicts, and found our abbey. They're now looking at our farms and burdenbeasts.
attributes.name: Nueda

attributes.content: Aurela has scouted the area. Tonight, she will lead us through a nearby canyon, and we will leave this place.
attributes.name: Nueda

attributes.content: We might go north into the plains, or south into the jungles. It will be a long trip, but we've been blessed with a good harvest. We will have enough food...
attributes.name: Nueda

attributes.content: Sister—
attributes.name: Bolívarian Child

attributes.content: Don't worry, Hugo.
attributes.name: Nueda

attributes.content: Trust Aurela. Trust me. Trust yourself and those around you. And trust 'Laterano'...
attributes.name: Nueda

attributes.content: Keep your voice steady. You remember the last verse, don't you?
attributes.name: Nueda

attributes.content: East of the east of La Unidad♪
Laterano, holy city of white♪
The guns there shoot fireworks♪
The targets are all apples♪
Through the chapel windows, Nueda watches the sunset. The halos of the Sanktas in the procession continue to illuminate the room, and the choir sings.

She has sung these hymns countless times. It is said that they were first written down by the saints, on their long and difficult journeys, and passed down through the centuries, translated and arranged by Bolívarian scholars.
'Laterano' will protect them through briar and bramble, through the long, cold night.
What the...?!
attributes.name: Nueda

attributes.content: Perhaps the sun left too soon and forgot to leave some light. The halos and wings of the Sanktas in the choir suddenly shatter, and their light is extinguished.
Nueda is stunned.
Her esoteric knowledge is vast, thanks to the legacy of the K'uk'ulkan, but not a single word or symbol explains the scene before her eyes.
She is so stunned that she forgets to stop singing, murmuring the hymns by sheer instinct. Trembling voices echo through the chapel—
Abode of our Lord, font of parental love♪
He punishes evil and drives out injustice♪
All shall bask in His love♪
Whether they have scars or stones♪
When we pray sincere, He gives us bread♪
When we seek salvation, He sets us free♪
Merda!
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: Agenir, your halo—
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Diamine!
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Wh-What's going on?
attributes.name: Blacksteel Administrator

attributes.content: Calm down. We figured out what's going on. Somebody forgot to set the right parameters when testing a gun at the firing range. Accidentally overloaded the power grid.
attributes.name: Tila

attributes.content: Engineering's on it and the power should come back any minute now... although, something doesn't feel quite right
attributes.name: Tila

attributes.content: It's pitch black. Of course something doesn't feel right—
attributes.name: Blacksteel Administrator

attributes.content: That's it! Where's Mr. Cliff's halo? It should be shining like a lamp—
attributes.name: Tila

attributes.content: Mr. Cliff?!
attributes.name: Tila

attributes.content: Woody?! I'll get a doctor!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Woody... no...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Mister Ezell... your halo... your wings... what...?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I'm fallen...?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Why...?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: W-Was it my fault?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Ugh—Laterano...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Seniora Lemuen!
attributes.name: Milkman

attributes.content: Saw you from across the street, but you didn't answer when I called your name...
attributes.name: Milkman

attributes.content: Oh, I'm sorry. I was about to—
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Oh, I forgot! It's your first day!
attributes.name: Milkman

attributes.content: Let's see. 'Your Eminence, Cardinal Lemuen', is that right?
attributes.name: Milkman

attributes.content: It is giving me goosebumps.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Hey, from submitting the application to becoming a cardinal's aide to finally getting the job, all it took was two years, right?
attributes.name: Milkman

attributes.content: Isn't that a new record for the Seventh Tribunal?
attributes.name: Milkman

attributes.content: It took much longer than breaking the wheelchair speed-shooting record.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Milkman

attributes.content: Just a joke.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Well, we all look up to you.
attributes.name: Milkman

attributes.content: There are two hundred households up and down three streets waiting for you to deliver the cystymilk for their morning fruit tart and post-meal desserts...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Meanwhile, how often is a cardinal's presence really needed for diplomatic and national security business in Laterano?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Who's to say which one of us is more important to the city?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Fair point. Guess I should get to work!
attributes.name: Milkman

attributes.content: I'll leave your cystymilk at the door. Two servings, as usual?
attributes.name: Milkman

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Where's Seniora Lemuel working, anyway? One day I hear it's a logistics company in Lungmen, the next day I hear it's security for that pharma company called Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Milkman

attributes.content: I miss her. It's been a long time since I last saw her.
attributes.name: Milkman

attributes.content: Who knows? Maybe she'll just show up tomorrow. And she wouldn't be happy if the fridge were empty.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You got that right.
attributes.name: Milkman

attributes.content: Hm, isn't this a bit of a detour if you're headed to the Seventh Tribunal?
attributes.name: Milkman

attributes.content: Just visiting a friend I haven't seen in a long time.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I see... have a nice day, Cardinal Lemuen.
attributes.name: Milkman

attributes.content: Have an uneventful day. May the Law be with you and me.
attributes.name: Milkman

attributes.content: Have a nice day.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Lemuen greets a few familiar faces on the way, then makes a turn at a corner, onto an utterly unremarkable street.
The clouds cast their shadows on the pristine paths. A breeze brings the sweet aroma in the air along with it. Soon, the surroundings grow quiet, as Lemuen approaches her destination.
Her life has undoubtedly changed. But her steps are light. She gladly welcomes these changes.
Lemuen has always been that way.
The Laterans have always been that way.
'Have an uneventful day. May the Law be with you and me.'
Lemuen utters those words.
At the end of the street is a massive building that nearly touches the clouds. The streamlined structure seems decidedly out of place amongst the low profile of church buildings around it.
It is no exaggeration to say that it virtually appeared out of nowhere, yet it also seems like it has always been there.
It welcomes Lemuen's arrival with open arms.
